strings:
<voice_0x0100190B><se_low>Rylus: Is that you, Dhoulmagus?
Where have you been all this time?
<voice_0x0100190C><se_low>Rylus: Anyway, I owe you an apology. I should not have spoken to you the way I did. Your failings as an apprentice are mine as a master.

<voice_0x0100190D><se_low>Rylus: But enough about that. I have great news!
After years of experimentation and research,
my elixir is all but complete!
<voice_0x0100190E><se_low>Rylus: When you drink it, it will awaken the latent magical potential that lies within you, Dhoulmagus.
<voice_0x0100190F><se_low>Rylus: And with a little hard work, you will at last be able to weave the potent enchantments you have always dreamt of.

<voice_0x01001911><se_low>Rylus: Where did you get that sceptre?
Oh no, you haven't...

<voice_0x01001914><se_def>Dhoulmagus: Ha hah! Wah ha ha ha hah!
Wa hah hah hah haaaah!
